settings.text: Intelligent Recording, Transcription & Translation in One Device

Equipped with cutting-edge AI technology, the UME AI VoiceRecorder offers real-time translation in 59 languages andintelligent summarization powered by GPT-4o. Perfect formeetings, lectures, or interviews, it allows you to quicklygenerate concise summaries and even create mind maps.

Experience exceptional audio clarity with our advanced AI noisecancellation technology. The dual-mode recording enginefilters out background noise even in crowded environments likecaf√©s or conference rooms, ensuring every word is capturedwith precision.

Store up to 540 hours of recordings with the built-in 64GBstorage. Your data security is our priority - all recordings areencrypted both locally and in the cloud, ensuring only you canaccess your files. The 1000mAh battery supports up to 20 hoursof continuous recording.

Start or stop recording with a single touch, either directly on thedevice or via the AIREC app. At just 0.31 inches thin andweighing only 0.12lb, the UME AI Voice Recorder easily fits intoyour pocket or bag, making it the perfect companion forprofessionals and students alike.
Capture every detail with precision in any scenario

Never miss important details during phone conversations. The UME AIVoice Recorder captures both sides of the conversation clearly, even innoisy environments. Simply attach it to your phone with the magneticring and start recording.

• Works with both iOS and Android devices
  • Captures both sides of the conversation
  • AI-powered noise reduction

Ideal for meetings, lectures, and interviews. Place the UME recorderon the table and capture clear audio from up to 9.8 feet away. Let thedevice do the note-taking while you focus on the conversation.

• ¬†9.8ft effective recording distance
  • Multi-directional audio capture
  • One-press operation

Smarter Meetings, Simplified. Get instant, comprehensive summaries and actionable task lists after every meeting. Understand discussions visually with mind maps and communicate globally with support for 59 languages. Turn your meetings into productive powerhouses with UME AI Voice Recorder.

settings.heading: How accurate is the AI transcription?

settings.text: The UME AI Voice Recorder achieves over 95% transcription accuracy in optimal conditions. The accuracy may vary slightly depending on factors such as background noise, speaker clarity, and accents. Our advanced AI noise cancellation technology significantly improves accuracy even in challenging environments like caf√©s or busy offices.

settings.heading: What languages are supported for transcription and translation?

settings.text: The UME AI Voice Recorder supports 59 languages for transcription and translation, including English, Spanish, French, German, Chinese (Mandarin and Cantonese), Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Hindi, and many more. The app is regularly updated to improve accuracy and add support for additional languages.

settings.heading: How does the phone call recording feature work?

settings.text: The UME AI Voice Recorder uses the included magnetic ring to attach securely to your smartphone. When in call recording mode, it captures both sides of the conversation through vibrations and audio. Simply attach the device to your phone, toggle the switch to call recording mode, and press the record button before or during your call. The recording is stored locally on the device and can be transferred to your smartphone via the app.

settings.heading: Is there a subscription fee for using the AI features?

settings.text: Your UME AI Voice Recorder purchase includes 540 minutes (9 hours) of AI transcription and summarization per month at no additional cost. This is sufficient for most users' needs. If you require additional transcription time, we offer flexible subscription plans for heavy users. All other features, including recording, storage, and basic app functionality, are available without any subscription.

settings.heading: How long does the battery last?

settings.text: The UME AI Voice Recorder features a 1000mAh rechargeable battery that provides up to 20 hours of continuous recording on a single charge. In standby mode, the battery can last up to 60 days. The device charges fully in approximately 1.5 hours via the included USB-C cable. The LED indicator on the device shows the current battery status.
